title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: A lone cow grazes on the opposite side of the fence that borders the path, snatching up clumps of verdant grass and chewing with a deliberant slowness.  Its tail swishes back and forth occasionally, batting at flies, while its mouth continues to placidly chew, chew, chew.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
